QuestData.Title: Trucebreakers
QuestData.Description:
Balakar disgraces his clan. He leads them into the storm, blinded by his lust for power.
Their betrayal reveals their fragility. Cut them down.
QuestData.RewardText:
The path they have chosen is now stained with blood.
Scout Tomul tried to warn us this might happen. She may have further suspicions.
